EmailTemplate.description: Temporary Solution provided to the Customer, triggered manually
EmailTemplate.name: Temporary Solution Provided
EmailTemplate.subject: Temporary Solution Provided: {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Subject}, {!Case.Reference_Number__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact}, Based on investigation and analysis, I’ve determined the temporary solution for this Case, with the reported issue of: {!Case.Subject}.
The temporary solution for the issue reported is defined as: {!Case.CH_TemporarySolution__c}
If you determine this temporary solution solves the issue reported, this may be accepted as a final solution for the issue reported.
As a reminder of this Case, the Case number is {!Case.CaseNumber} for the {!Case.Type} Case, with the Product identified as {!Case.Product} reported to Nokia at {!Case.CH_ReportedDate__c}.
Should you need to follow up on this case, please use this Case Number as reference.
If you would like to view or update your case online, please click here
Regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName}
